# Capacitor Next

> FluxCD-focused, browser-based Kubernetes UI. Like k9s in the browser; like the ArgoCD UI, just lighter.

## Primary resources
- [App Home](/)
- [Documentation Hub](/docs/)
- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/gimlet-io/capacitor)
- [Install Script](https://gimlet.io/install-capacitor)

## Quickstart
```bash
wget -qO- https://gimlet.io/install-capacitor | bash
# then run
next --port 3333
# open http://localhost:3333
```

## About
Capacitor Next helps teams explore Kubernetes resources, view Flux reconciliation, diff desired vs actual state, inspect Helm releases, and navigate clusters with keyboard-driven UX.
